channel.title: A few questions about a tutorial
channel.description:
I installed this tutorial: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,5940.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,5940.0.html[/url]
This are my questions: 1. How can I make that right menu? EG: When I press smithing I get a screen and in the right menu you can select bronze, iron, steel, mithril etc...
2. My text is in de center of the screen! How can I set it to the left?
3. How can I add an icon like a bronze med helm? I found this code: [code]addItemToSmith(1139,1,1119,1);[/code]
But it doesn't work if it does work where do I need to put it?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 08, 2006, 01:30:28 PM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: A few questions about a tutorial
item.dc:creator: @test123 test123
item.description:
@test123 wrote:

I installed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,5940.0.html

This are my questions:

  1. How can I make that right menu? EG: When I press smithing I get a screen and in the right menu you can select bronze, iron, steel, mithril etc…

  2. My text is in de center of the screen! How can I set it to the left?

  3. How can I add an icon like a bronze med helm?
    I found this code:

addItemToSmith(1139,1,1119,1);

But it doesn’t work if it does work where do I need to put it?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 08, 2006, 01:30:28 PM[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions about a tutorial
